message: I propose a fair split considering the 20% devaluation you face per round. If you reject, your next offer will be worth less to you.
I think this is a fairer split considering the devaluation. Let's be reasonable and end this game.
Due to the 40% total devaluation you now face, this $30 is only worth $18 to you. If you reject, the next round will reduce your value by another 20%. It's in your best interest to accept now.
